column4: I'm trying to install a package but I keep getting a dependency error.  It says it needs ia32-libs but the version of ia32-libs I have installed is the most recent.  Is there something else I need to do to setup ia32-libs so the system can make use of it?
is it coming from a 3rd party repo?
The package I'm trying to install is coming from the humble bundle.
www.humblebundle.com  It's a really neat setup and a good way to try indie games on linux.  It's not really a repo though.
